ChangeNote: Fix the program error cause by modified message clean up.
Introduced a new 'EditDropDownHeight' property in 'BarCheckedDropDownList' to manually control the height of the dropdown popup.
Some charts were defined with textual Y-fields?

When doing an update of SimCorp Dimension then the images folder is only update in case the setting of the icon color of SimCorp Dimension is changed in cnf.ini. In case some files were missing in the images folder then these were not put in there.  This is changed now the images folder is updated on every Major update of SimCorp Dimension
Internal change, not affecting customers. Created auto-test for Loan facilities Combine Pay Out Unsettled
An assertion error occurred when trying to import entities of type POSRCAPPROVALCONF. This has been corrected.
Added possibility to show summary values for group rows
The settlement days are early fetched for TRS in the Trade Manager.
Remove fax number from the hlpAbout screen and change the logos for third party vendors.
In Compliance Configuration window two settings have been deleted together with a related option "Legacy" for the setting "Active/passive determination enabled".
NA
Flaky test ignored
Alternative Document Processing - Correcting database error when deleting a document with a specific setup (one document-ID with multiple unsuccessful imports)
Fetch the Model Portfolios from SAAM along with the MPs from the positions
New ad-hoc reporting API family Business Entity that reflects the existing API family AssignmentUnits for specific assignment unit type Business Entity.
introduced a check for delta before streaming
Refactor comment formatting in TransStatusTPDDataTransDataEditorList to improve readability and consistency

The Base Filter (#2049) for import of "Controlling\Compliance\External Data\External Values" information has been updated to include Entity, as external values can now be assigned to business entities.
Sunset use of old logon prompt
When switching the 'Account ID' in the  'Credit Accrued Interest' window the error message 'Bank account not valid for bank' could wrongly appear. This has been fixed.
Create Banded Grid logical control
Improved performance of Alerts Inbox: updated how the system reads reconciliation runs so the database can find each run in one quick step, speeding up queries and reducing load times.
Implement the process of saving information about the execution time of the PL\SQL procedure for generating a new transaction number for autonomous saving
Fix  trade date, settlement days, payment date relation on Exercise transaction when building default data after pressing Exercise in Position Search context menu.
Remove fax number from SimCorp About popup
Build script was updated with nuget package generation for IMS.UP.ApiClient project
Attempt to stabilize flaky test. Added bulk insert support to DatabaseDataSource and more to speed up some unit tests.
Extends transaction options with Consider Elimination accounting check box on portfolio from date
Added more tests that cover SCD Web functionality
Execute button is disabled if there are no changes and enabled when some value is changed in grid
All Security Class Level and Additional Security Class screens will include the menus and the tool bar, when opened via Edit table from the static data Security Classification sub screens.
Fixed: Error log forcrash due to a LENGTH ERROR. Root cause is xarg with missing data. We here add a type check to our failing function.
N/A Internal test
APL is on a single thread, so the static "caches" are reused on a second call. These caches must be cleared in case of data has been updated by user after the first batch job run.
All authorization profiles that a user has been assigned to via different roles should be taken into account when evaluating if a user has access to a data selection.

In the 'Portfolio Calculation' 'Simulated unrealised hedge depreciation QC/PC'  was not calculated in case a position was lend out and part of a hedge relationship at the same time. This has been fixed.

The 'Save effect details' check box in Performance Measurement controls if risk factor sensitivities and factor changes should be aggregated into the measurement tree and saved to the result tables. The user is asked if existing details data should be deleted when changing the check box selection. But nothing was deleted even if the user chooses to delete. This error has been corrected so the sensitivity and factor change data that is toggled by the check box is deleted if the user chooses to delete.
Optimize the ShowEventInformation method
Making reconnect more robust and not throwing as many error logs
NA
It should be allowed to save several BEs when they do not overlap
Technical changes for test automation: Enable BT framework to TRS CA transactions for TRS with underlying bond
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to disambiguate between no result and many results when selecting from the DB in expansion rules. Changes made to the code do not affect system behavior.
Handle treat as mandate when business entity changes

When result monitor applet shows a lot of results (several thousands) and a lot of results were changed in DB (> 5000) then Reconciliation manager freezes for several minutes.  This was fixed and now refresh goes much faster
Roll back interface changed for the draft implementation on S-198775
Add hint to database query selecting related pre-trade results for alerts.
Reviewed At/By fields are no longer overwritten when the AltInv DocProc Status Viewer applet is opened or refreshed.
Adding new segment in Decomposition profile(RM->Positions->Decomposition settings)
Conversion program that takes "Legacy (available until version 25.10)" for Compliance Configuration setting "Active/passive determination enabled" and sets to "Yes".
NA
X- and Y-axis titles were not shown in charts in 3T
Added more log on run of the failing test.
This is a technical change for internal development tools with no impact on business functionality.
You could have a WS FULL (limit error) in connection with fetching data that lead to an errorlog being created. Going forward it will just ask you to limit your search.
Internal change, not affecting any customers. Created an autotest for Loan facilities Combine transactions with unsettled Sells and Nominal split.
Transaction modification support was added for Stream Transactions related functionality
The client side now manages the size of the Table controls page
Additional filtering was added for election's holdings
Flaky test fixed

When database connection  from SimCorp Dimension was disconneted from the outside it could happen that reconnect from SimCorp Dimension was not possible and a restart was required. This has been fixed.
Fix deadlock during multiple block trade allocations coming.

Fix deviations after refactoring
NA

Fix error which caused a crash while trying to save 2 records in 'Corporate Action' static data window. One of the records already existed with Choice checkbox checked & validation error, and another record is a new one.

If added via 'Extra Search Condition Fields' it is now possible to use BIC fields in settlement segments.

Set incorrect reference rate period to 1 day
Exception mapping was not correct n certain database exceptions
Collateral Cassini integration:  issue a message to user regarding not recommended AccrIntCalc settings on Pool.
New transaction code Split Pay Out Unsettled, and it's reversal, was made for loan facility split transactions made in the unsettled period.

A wrong error message could occur from the elementary transaction codes validation for the Trade Manager Exercise CDS option business transaction code. A minor change to the validation for this transaction code has been made.
This story enables the TRS instrument in the Opening Balance form. Needed in TRS/CA context. - Further position sign will be added to the 'Additional Data' subform.
Export of SRVCCONF-STP was missing dependency to AUXMSGS, leading to import failing. This has been corrected.

BridgeStartupTimeoutMinutes and BridgeConnectionRetryCount values used for the APL bridge connection will be retrieved from the configuration parameters.

When exporting PERFMEAS with tree type 'Investment structure node' the configuration dependency to INVSTRDEFS are missing. This has been corrected.

If the test project references a newer MSTest but your runner (or another assembly) is binding to an older version, the method signature may not be found.
Use ReferenceEquals instead of AreSame method
Extend CMSSO interface for OneLib

If a Automation service scaling strategy cannot be loaded automation service will create a trace message, but as tracing is not normally enabled it is difficult to see why scaling does not work for a service type. A log message have been added when a scaling strategy cannot be loaded.
Add new pointer for "Flexible yearly dates" checkbox that will be used in the Execution label to regulate the Position calculation dates
Remove table tMOEXTCASHFLOWCLASSVAL dependency for MOEXTERNALCASHFLOW configuration type
Make GROUPCODEVALS as config dependency for MOCASHFLOWADJUSTMENTFACTORS  transporter
Mass Update is now shown only for main leg of any transaction
Added "Swift MX 2" column in Netting Manager to also display MX messages in cases when both MT and MX messages are created
Fix incorrect Nominal calculation on CA open transaction in TM
Direct trace files to TelemetryStore in MUCS.exe
Internal change, no changes to customer functionality. Enhanced an internal test for Spread Change transaction with contract-level accounting of unsettled sells.
[TECHNICAL-3T] Add ctEDIT to the list of items
Fixed  sticky session behavior when connectiontarget is "*" and downstream service agent was changed
Implemented new random number generation method which works with fixed seed when new riskfactors added to selection.
Missing External values has Data Exception instead of System Exception
In a "Netting Manager" form, if an "Aux. job type" is  "Transaction - Netting" and the corresponding netting rule requests to send SWIFT MX an error message is shown.
Adding Security Classification to the C# client of the Security API.
Wrong value written to the result type field in the reporting helper table CMPLREPDETAILS. This has been fixed.

Add decomposition of Alternative investment funds in performance calculation upload
Grey out Model portfolio field for all Business Entity Types

ChangeNote: Attributes are changed in Mass Update TDIs to add open related functionality

Logic specific to a single client was removed in Performance Measurement. The logic hard coded the benchmark return to 0% on the first day for new dynamic split value nodes in the Performance Measurement tree.
Internal code optimisation in Forecast cash flow service. Front Office's detailed logging for deletion is removed, although an overall deletion count performance counter is kept.
To improve stability and prevent authentication-related failures during batch processing, a conditional bypass has been implemented for the duplicate check in the MDV queue
Fixed authorization for "Mandate default - Portfolio group" field in Data Selector
Make sure Analysis date is UTC kind and make data last updated in UTC format

Rank summary fields should not be added as internal fields with context NeededForSummaries, because then they will always be added.
Change context to None and add field to dependency collection.
Raise status from Warning to Error for Extraction object is not validated message for Extraction Exporter Definition.
Mass Update command enabled for FX trades
Make Workspace size requirement lower for position calculation decomposition
Add option to assign external value to business entities.
Implemented additional validations for commission calculation request sent via AzSB.
Improved performance of Alerts Inbox in System Manager by optimizing processing logic of inner DB selects.

it should be covered by D-90891
Internal change. Not visible for clients.

A new logicalForm created to switch language, now we recreate the user session and set UICulture with the new selected language

Fixed a system reversal problem for data in HOLDUNSETFACCNTMATCH table
Crash in Risk Measurement/Performance Calculation/Position calculation in case of decomposing hybrid funds. Was fixed
Enable basic streaming functionality for creation of new transactions.
This is an internal change to improve development performance with no impact on business functionality.

Fix for crash when opening the security classification window from the portal

To fix an issue when General election status is erroneously changed when we transfer to static data
This is part of a larger development for allowing corporate actions on instruments which are part of a Total return swap.
[Technical/3T] Support updating group labels runtime
Dependencies were not declared to GROUPCODEVALS, and GROUPCODEVALS were not translated to external values. This has been corrected.
This is an internal change to improve development performance with no impact on business functionality.
Searched the code for  trcOPENRETSWAP  and  trcCLOSERETSWAP and evaulate if the same logic should apply for  trcCAOPENTRS and  trcCACLOSETRS.
Update of internal SimCorp tool, which does not affect any customer installations
Internal framework change. No client functionality affected.
Security Classification fields added to the internal Security API
Duplicate of D-91849
New test created for combine transactions for loan facility contracts in the unsettled period
Support OneLib CMS spread options in the Risk flow
Trade manager: add exposure convention under Delta convention setup window to define the way exposure should be calculated for FX option, vanilla.
Fix the issue, now the simulated transactions with non-zero price are not priced with Fixed Implied Spread pricing approach.
Validate names if already doesn't exist
Refactor eventik handling in sec_LoanFacUpdateEventLinking to simplify logic and improve readability and cover case when more then one new record was added to Events tab
Redundant table name removed
Added Auxiliary job check for transactions in Netting Manager update logic for better performance (no functional changes)
Fix crash on showing chart in hidden tab
Improved work flow on APL side for function sceFutBond2Keys
Added validation of fixing dates for SOFR index bonds
Fixed vulnerable version for vite npm package
OPT Orders rejected by OM for Triton pipeline
When General reconciliation calculates cash integrity it could crash due to reconciliation values have wrong numeric format. This was fixed
A Cancelled event was added to Fipa Effect Calculation application.
Add support for the <ValueDate> tag in the XML. Value from this tag to update 'Settlement date' on transaction
Added enum with possibility to choose whether to use singleton or per call lifetime. Value is passed to the GrpServiceHostFactory
Ensure that UP Telemetry is always enabled, when useupdbi is configured
extend integration tests coverage
Total return swap adjustments window updated with transaction code and corporate action event indicator fields.
The corporate action event indicator is visible in the transaction list in the window ‘Transaction Status’.
New ad-hoc reporting API family PortfolioGroups that reflects the existing API family AssignmentUnits for specific assignment unit type Portfolio Group.
InitHold transactions had no effect on Loan Facilities. The error has been solved.
Improve error handling of .Net formula execution in compliance engine.
Development increment for making the compliance engine use a common data source
DWH: FIx DataShare ignoring user changes when called via the new service
It is now possible in the fields dependencies window for a auxiliary job if the condition should apply to all legs on a transaction.
Calculation loops are created taking into the account configuration parameters.
Remove SignalR endpoint from Application Service Three Tier (105)
Correct the testMoLiftRiskMeasSetInt according to the new 'Allow negative price' field added to RM - Models - Options - Internal Models sub-window. Field is opened for input
Enable test
Added more info when an rare occurring error happens

When 'Executing ' a 'Rebalancing' setup with 'Rebalancing type 'Currency overlay' and having 'Decompose funds' checked the error message 'You are trying to rebalance a setup containing unsupported instrument type(s)...' could wrongly also appear for decomposed positions. This has been fixed.
Introduce basic markup for pivot control

When a window like ‘Total Return Swap Adjustments’ is already opened but cleared and a TRS position opening transaction is opened in the Trade Manager users can go to the basket adjustments grid and do an ‘Open related’ operation on any eventual transaction number there. This should effect that the latter transaction is opened and fetched in the first-mentioned window.
To make sure that no application code calls directly into vwViewUpdate functions, all vwViewUpdate functions now have "private scope"

The system didn't detect the right dependencies for User Defined Key Ratios so that the subtotal calculation in the AM Cache Api did not calculate the right numbers if not all  QC/PC/RC fields were explicitly stated
Go live UP CI/CD
Trade Manager: In preparation for FX options
Improve handling of rare case where an update of a capital notice document would fail to save in Alternative Investments Manager.
Error will apear if you try to save business entities across multiple branches
new domain value was added.
The STP order aux match service crashed when processing messages. This has been corrected.
Trade Manager:  add upper and lower barriers for OTC spread option underlyings.
Development increment for compliance data streaming feature
Not relevant for release
Added new field, validation logic and tests
Refactor: clean up Modified Value-at-Risk.
Deal Capture dynamic portal entries have been added to the portal menu
add new integration test scenario
Log disposed executionscope usage as information when it is false positive
Improvement to the compliance engine unit tests.
Avoid crash in calculations for OneLib convertible bonds, when the key ratio OAS is not requested.

In a trade repository pool, mandatory field check was not executed for records with "late execution" checkbox checked. As a result, information about an error was not entered in the "Protocol of pool" field. This has been fixed now.
refactoring and cosmetic changes for the new codes have been introduced.
Enable 'Repo yield + spot yield curve' price method in Risk engine
New ad-hoc reporting API family Funds that reflects the existing API family AssignmentUnits for specific assignment unit type Fund.
Enhancement of FTP port to decouple the error handling aspects from the automatic retry mechanism for ports that are not configured to actively listen.
The Datawarehouse Load Plans batch jobs can now use the Cloud Data Warehouse API service
Correction of programm error found while decomposing. Related to IFRS9 purpose inheritance.
switched to using the metadata while getting the field count
Enabled handling of 'Disable period closure for event transactions' setting in VYA (Variable Yield Adjustments) event.
Security Classification fields added to the internal Security API
Make price info key as a key when calculating unitized securities

When a transaction is modified on a high status with a auxiliary job that has Now (outside commit sequence) then there is a timing issue that can trigger that the cancel job on the reversed transaction is triggered twice. This has been corrected.
Code changes are not affected functionality for clients. Only for internal installations
Tests modified to be not flaky
The summary type for alphanumeric custom fields is now Unique
Create a new window for Order Combination Rules - Definition. Called "Combination Rules".
Implemented a few brick tests covering the NAIC workflow with Income Match Information.
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve triggering on readonly changes. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
Improve error handling on UP DBI

Compliance Post-trade batch evaluation: As significant amount of time was spend evaluating assignment units without any rules assigned, in case the compliance configuration "Active/passive determination enabled" was set to "Yes". This has been fixed.
It has been seen that AplIndexError could occur when calling int APL during dispose of a form
Call instRead only for  instInsTypes tSWAPS inside truIsNdsNettedLeg.
Do not use deployment items on dlls already in the bin folder

In certain situations it was possible for a service to attempt a fallback to local APL execution after failing to find an APL worker service instance w/o actual being capable of executing locally. This would cause an error with a difficult to understand message. The error message has now been improved.
A program error occurred when opening report tree as system admin and report authorisation was enabled. This has been corrected.
read input from trade manager for cms spread options
SmokeTest tool refactoring
Custom attribute restrictions have been added in the Filter section of Alternative Investments - Calculation Engine Results window.

In Netting Manager aligned pop-ups for MT and MX when  "Keep netting after un-netting" setting is set to "Never" in Transactions Options.
Add predefined "DataWarehouse" API role with access to all Cloud DWH Service endpoints
If latest layout is deleted somehow, use default one to set to current.
corrections for 3t
In some cases we can hit an assertion in the beginning of the booking engine.  For examle in case of a missing connection. This change allows for a bit more informatoin.
Import of EPDATAPOOLTYPES entries could fail due to cyclic references. This has been corrected.
Rounding for Interest in Securities Lending Maturity transaction window was corrected.
Introduce UP tenant level TimeProvider and provide a TimeReader based implementation for lift code
Added Managed Identity connection type for AM cache services
Finalize Spread Change Out Unsettled tests

Implements the generation functionality for 'Combine Pay Out Unsettled' transaction including linking, skipped interest calculations. Relevant list functions have been updated/created. Test functionality have been extended where relevant
IMW-specific checks are now mandatory; Additional checks added

The flag ‘Adjustment done’ must be set to false in the security data for planned adjustments for TRS when the corresponding adjustment transaction is deleted from the ‘Transaction Status’ window. The planned adjustments can be seen in a grid on the position  opening transaction.

Web-UC SQ failure fix

In some rare cases it is not possible to reise the transaction is status due to the debit/credit error in the finance transaction
The fix rounded the PL so that will eliminate the issue. Relavant for average methods only and in-leg of reallocation like transactions.
This is an internal change for integration tests. The change has no impact on customers.
No changes on the Defect (everything were reverted). Customer should apply Field Format IDs to the large fields.
Change atuthorisation of btPOSRCINTERIMSUSPAY batch task General Reconciliation

When a SimCorp Dimension installation have too many open alerts (> 10.000) the Business rules alerts service could become unresponsive during processing of alert changes and therefore were shutdown by the service platform. The error has been fixed. In addition the service now logs a warning before every new change processing  in case the SimCorp Dimension installation has more than 10.000 open alerts.
Make connections from APL pinned

Small performance improvement
Add restrictions to reference rate day count to add better error messages
Implemented tracing and logging of events for Batch API service
When dealing with STP, costs were read
DWH: DataShare to work via the new API service

Collateral Management: The recommendation message for cases where not all transactions were saved successfully during Allocation/Substitution has been improved. If an error occurs when using the external Cassini system, the message suggests Cassini-specific actions; otherwise, it does not.
Fixed Nominal in Modify position window to respect current Percentage change on Incremental update
making the APL changes required to support portfolio files split
Add exact rating rank field  for benchmark lines in Portfolio sheet used for compressed benchmark
Added Reset to default and Undo buttons to the double-selection list control

When saving new issue of a Japanese government bond in Asset manager (Simulations/Portfolio sheet applet), the 1st coupon payment date is automatically calculated based on issue date and coupon term & unit.
Improper data display for AI static data was fixed
FX placement now can be auto-allocated when done for day flag is received
It is possible to distinguish credit risk folders from normal folders
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to trigger value changed in the lightweight backend. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
group code field was added
Improve the user experience when Api Gateway Service is down
This is an internal change. It has no customer impact.
The error was a regression due to recent changes. We have adjusted those recent changes to not affect this area.
Restrict on selected types when search and when popup opens
New ad-hoc reporting API family Portfolios that reflects the existing API family AssignmentUnits for specific assignment unit type Portfolio.

A new service in Service Manager is added to pull data for a total portfolio view in the new frontend. There will be a new tab in Service Options to set up a service bus connection as well as a new window for saving configurations such that it is possible to start multiple service instances with different configurations.
For queues of type input, new priorities have been added. Before the priority could be Low/Med/High, now there are nine values from Lowest/Medium/Highest.
Moving resources to new Azure landing zone. Including use of Microsoft Entra Id authentication.
After an investment link reallocation, the common values (like Paid-in, Called Capital, Return of Capital, flexible custom balances) for the old/outgoing holding in the position results are correct.
Cake scripts were updated to produce package that targeted to net472 and net8.0
Internal change when debugging 3T: now using linked code page to have access to additional development code.

In some cases reconciliation payments were generated with wrong portfolio currency. It has been fixed.
Add assertion for call money transactions that do not belong to corresponding collateral pool.
Cassini integration: Added validation which prevents auto substitution  via MM   for multi-currency calls via CASSINI
Pre-trade results have grown in size because information irrelevant to the performed pre-trade check is included in the results. This has been fixed.
When un-match reconciliation results with pending payment action in Result Monitor, then system should cancel issue of reversal suspense payments on saving.
Add Insert, Update, Delete authorizations to ExecuteMassUpdate command in Mass Update screen
Ensure the commitment amount on the out leg is filled correctly when settling a loan facility trade date transaction from the 'Unsettled Loan facility Trades' window
Cash Backet Allocation Schemes -> Created/Changed window. Problem with context menu on right click on any field was fixed

For convertible bonds priced with OneLib only tranform the Quoted price method to Theoretical when the discounting cuve was shocked in market data scenarios.
Changed title of "Asset Manager Cache monitor" from using the "AM"-abbreviation to "Asset Manager"

Trace output from IMSTrace has been improved wrt execution stack information. To correctly identify the calling assembly, the starting index in the call stack should normally be 2 for external callers, and 3 for calls originating within the same class.
The new package for generating transaction numbers has been created.
Made block transaction numbers shown for block trades only
Add new ribbon command 'Interim suspense payments' to the Result Monitor (Reconciliation Manager). This new command will allow to generate interim suspense payment in bulk.

In the following case a program error would occur upon execution of the Performance Measurement:
-	When having historical returns imported for a node entering later than the initial date.
-	Historical returns being imported on days before the node starts.
-	 First defined historical return term for the node is set to be before the node starts, afterwards during executing of the Performance Measurement, the first defined historical return term is set to be on the same day the node starts.
This has been resolved.
On a stage where a message is imported into SCD, a validation of the transaction number was added.

The Base Filter (#1796) for import of "Administration/Fund Administration/ Fund Static Data/Fund Definitions" information has been updated. 1 field Schedule was added. 3060, Time Series: Schedule Rule id= 384
Refactoring: appl argument was removed from truCallCurCalcCore and subfunctions
The Cloud Data Warehouse API service can now execute a Load Plan via a new endpoint

To speed up the transaction generation via STP, the portfolio grouping will be ignored if saving transactions on low status. This grouping are made to reduce the number of services locking each other, but when saving on low status this is not a problem.

Previously, DateTime values in Assign Values Definitions were stored using the local time format of the user who created them. When these values were applied, they were automatically converted to the local time format of the current user, potentially causing inconsistencies.
With this update, DateTime values are now stored using the Unspecified time format, ensuring consistent interpretation across different users regardless of their local time settings.
The Rule entry - Credit Risk fields Collateral, issuer risk and Collateral, cpt. risk have now been re-enabled for holding base rules.
When scrolling over templates in AM Settings Template, Cash Viewer tab display is updating.
This is an internal change. This will not affect client functionality.

Statistical key ratios (e.g. Alpha, Beta, Treynor, R-squared, Correlation) are not calculated in Performance Measurement and Performance Extra Fields in Performance Reports and Performance Manager if the daily return measure is below a predefined threshold value. The threshold value has been decreased from 1E-6 to 1E-12, thereby broadening the scope for when the statistical key ratios are calculated. As a consequence, the calculated values of the statistical key ratios may change from zero to a non-zero value if the return measure was below the previous threshold value.
When generating data sets from AM Cache some fields were always included in the data set as they were (incorrectly) marked as need for subtotal calculation.

A correction is made to the factor based FIPA fair cash flow on decomposed spot legs of IRF positions in Performance Calculation. This affects the fair cash flow itself as well as the factor based FIPA local return, when this is calculated using the TWR based approach. The correction ensures that the cash flow adjustment is consistently based on exposure, which removes spikes in the factor based FIPA local return on decomposed IRF positions on days with buy or sell transactions.

Use a different counting mechanism

Unit tests has been added with examples of how SimCorp Dimension developers can use the new Unified Platform Database Interface query language
Support horizontal and vertical grid lines
Expose internal endpoint information of NET 8 Sample Service
YieldForMathAdjSold to be present in MPV and TL
Loading UP DBI when  running in users mode.
For the new opening contract 'Effective date' should be copied from the initial contract if the 'Rolling dates' set to 'Payment dates'. Otherwise, 'First valuation date' should be copied.
DWH: Technical debt removal
NA

Now, in the CTM screen, if a transaction that has only outgoing messages is selected, then the "Open Match" button in the form is enabled. If you press the button, the form "Match" will open and the tab "Deviations" will be activated. The figures of deviations will look like you get an empty (contains only zeros) confirmation message.
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve Rule ordering. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
A GUI for connection configuration has been created.
Resolve leak in UP ConnectionPool and F.Data.Managed
xAssert was changed to a proper xs error
Error importing formulas using the getrepdatapool function.
created unit tests
Technical code refactoring - no production changes
The STP workflow for mass update must be able to update costs on transactions
Add support for context menu to API Logical Form Test Framework
This is a refactoring. No changes to customer functionality
Added validation rule to Float Rate Index Definitions form. Now Customer Business Centre only allowed for TRSs
A program error during mass export has been fixed.

Validation improved when saving a portfolio authorisation segment. If trying to save a segment which will return all portfolios, e.g. the only condition in the segment is 'Portfolio group is not null' then the system will stop this, and suggest the user to save this as an empty segment instead.
Add pFXRATEUNSETTRADEQP into tTRANSGCVAL/bufTRANSGCVAL for proper P/L calculation on Settle Loan Facilities transactions.
Update InputFieldDefinition fields when a new row is created
Interal: Create a unit test that verifies consistency of default values
Added support for using translation in STP Receiver filter.
Change of internal tests. No clients impacted.
1T pmnt freq is now available in the drop down in case of empty interest type in IRS
UDKR weight fields were not excluded from calculation and streaming, fixed now.
Flaky test fixed
Define vartypes for some fp pointers which previously used PtrVT override
Improve type safety for code related to key ratio mappings
Internal change. Not user visible
Improve AltInv GUI integration tests error handling, to help with diagnosing failures and improve tests adding rows into grids with existing sorted fields.
removed axioma and java base path from UI
Flaky test ignored
Increasing api test coverage for delta vector
Fix crash when Risk Instrument Exception Settings -Upload batch task is running
Connections to the database are not properly configured
NA
In Edit Multiple Securities - Bonds screen, the fields 'Coupon freqency (months)' and 'Redemption freqency (months)', will now have 'frequency' correctly spelt.
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve the internal rule evalution mechanism. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
The lifetime for liquidating funds has been slightly adjusted so additional distributions are forecasted.
Internal work in OTC Core: Merge innovation work into main/master
QC and PC key ratios were not not calculated for mid-curve swaptions using OneLib valuation. Resolved by setting pool factor to 1
Fixed incorrect status calculated in broker statement reconciliation when having both statement.
Flaky test has been fixed and re-enabled again.
New Cloud Data Warehouse API service
Fix a crash in OM allocation message processing for FX swaps
An internal unit test did not test the code properly. The error has been corrected.
added check for BatchSUbform
Remove StackTraces
FIPA effect calculation batch job: It is  no longer possible to save a batch job of type "FIPA effect calculation", if a  FIPA effect calculation definition isn't attached

The 'Benchmark Calculation - Upload Results' batch job will now filter the SAAM target weights, so it only includes structures that contain relevant model portfolios. Target weights will thus be filtered away if they are defined on a "dummy" structure that is based on model portfolios for which SAAM weights have never been calculated in Benchmark Calculation.

A correction to how the transaction code is filled and cleared on the Paydown Loan Facility transaction, ensuring all validations are triggered when changing the contract upon modification of the transaction
The performance of generation of new GL holding keys have been improved.
AltInv GUI integration test has been improved.
Interact with checkbox via its label
